title: BESS ENCLOSURE
fullText:
The BESS enclosure shall have at least two separate compartments including â€”
(a) one that houses the battery system; and
(b) one that houses the PCE.
Associated equipment may be housed in either compartment depending on the requirements for the specific hazards referred to in Clauses 6.3.1 to 6.3.7.
The battery system and PCE enclosures shall be accessed separately (e.g. via separate doors).
